value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral MASSES ULTRALISKS vs Zest?! (Zerg vs Protoss)
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 between Serral and Zest. In this match Zest opens up with what looks like a standard turtle Sky Toss style. However, as he transitions towards a lot of Gateways, Serral is forced to respond and decides to go for Ultralisks. Ultras versus Protoss are incredibly uncommon.

value.title: StarCraft 2: ULTRALISKS VERSUS PROTOSS? (soO vs Zest)

In this professional match between Zest and soO, soO gets a solid advantage by focusing on Swarm Hosts
